    • gamemodels中Strategy的使用

      实现Strategy的gamemodels中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  Aggressive
      Aggressive strategy in reinforcement and attack and fortification phase.
      class  Benevolent
      Benevolent strategy in reinforcement and attack and fortification phase
      class  Cheater
      Cheater strategy in reinforcement, attack and fortification phase.
      class  Human
      Human strategy in reinforcement and attack and fortification phase
      class  Random
      Random strategy in the reinforcement, attack and fortification phase.
